ai-cp32:1.1_0: “I’m not ever to ask for a question,
ai-cp32:3.3_0: just as I have been told.
ai-cp32:3.4_0: If you can see me, you are.’
ai-cp32:4.3_0: Having gone to the delightful city of Kapilavatthu,
ai-cp32:5.1_0: After recollecting the Dhamma of the good,
ai-cp32:5.3_0: to the brāhmaṇa, having given a wealth to the brāhmaṇa,
ai-cp32:5.4_0: and I went to a charnel ground.
ai-cp32:6.2_0: nor will someone else beat them.
ai-cp32:6.5_0: there is no equal for me.
